alert.note: Alert for Conecuh; Escambia; Monroe (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 6:28PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Monroe, Escambia, southwestern Conecuh and northeastern Santa Rosa Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 628 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Brewton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brewton, McCullough, East Brewton, Castleberry, Excel, Repton, Pollard, Riverview and I65 And AL 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Alabama...and northwestern Florida.
